Package hc.server.util

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Assistant
    the assistant of current project is implemented by project provider, which process voice command.

    if you don't want to implement a assistant, and hope HCAI (HomeCenter AI) to do same work for you, please see detail on Assistant.onVoice(VoiceCommand).
    IDEUtil  
    JavaLangSystemAgent
    the HomeCenter provide build-in SecurityManager for HAR project.
    JavaString
    this class is used to provide java String functions in JRuby.
    for more, see String.
    Scheduler
    A Scheduler maintains a registry of Jobs and Triggers.
    SystemEventListener
    The listener for receiving project or session events.
    VoiceCommand
    the voice which user speaks in client.
